name: motherboard (buttersteaks)
description:
Our main goal for this game was to explore AI such as GPT-3 and Dall-E 2 to create the assets and most of the story-line. The prompts that you see in the game are largely generated by GPT-3, using prompts engineered by our story team (AKA Brian).

How to Play:
Motherboard is largely a point and click game. Use your mouse to navigate the story and the minigames, and find out what happens in the end.

Team:
Story / Prompt Engineer – Brian
Code – Adam, Baz, May
Music, SFX – May

Third Party Assets:

  1. Dall-E 2 for background scenes
  2. Craftpix for Sprites
  3. FreeMusicArchive for Music and SFX
    1. Soularflair - Soundscape 20
    2. Kris Keyser - Only Henry
    3. Homesweet - Sprite Heart Bleeds No More
    4. Gigakoops - The Closing of Chaos
    5. John Bartmann - Robot Gypsy Jazz

Hint: If the jetpack/plane sequence is too hard, perhaps F7 can help you.
